843670.name: [MARS] Total Warfare - Annual Player upgrade (2019)
843670.description:
This DLC gives access to:

  • Edit (or vote to edit) the settings of all battles with normal permission configuration
    - This includes at least all battles created by Free to Play users and Player upgrade owners
  • Play battles with up to 250 players
  • Watch replays
  • Play for credits (3670 credits included)
  • Choose team color
  • Enjoy a higher quality of service on our network


The upgrade is valid for a minimum of one year from the date of purchase, after which it will be sustained as long as your credit balance is greater than zero, with the potential to be extended indefinitely by additional credits that you win.
